title: Material Max Homepage
description: Material Max is a web app built using Firebase and Vue.js technologies. It provides users with a convenient platform to purchase construction materials and access construction-related services. The app is accessible from any device with an internet connection and offers a seamless user experience.

title: Heny Web
description: Heny is creating a managed market place for Authentic African experiences where individuals and small business get to participate the the gig economy by sharing their experiences and culture with others. These experiences are seen by our over 2,400+ customers who are interested in new experiences.We envision to be the driving force that is empowering users to discover new experiences across the globe. Simply put, HENY is helping users discover new experiences across Africa

title: PDA Funds Web
description: PDA Funds is a fintech app built using Flutter, Nest.js, Vue.js, and Firebase. It provides users with an easy-to-use platform to invest in mutual funds, bonds, equities, and offers loan options. The app is accessible from any device and leverages modern technologies for a fast and secure user experience.

title: Stanbic Funeral Collection
description: Stanbic Funeral Collection is a platform built with React and Django that allows users to easily collect and manage funeral donations. It provides an intuitive interface for creating collections and tracking contributions, while ensuring a fast and secure user experience.

title: PDA App
description: PDA Funds is a fintech app built using Flutter, Nest.js, Vue.js, and Firebase. It provides users with an easy-to-use platform to invest in mutual funds, bonds, equities, and offers loan options. The app is accessible from any device and leverages modern technologies for a fast and secure user experience.

title: Digi-Farm
description: Digifarm is a farmer's aid platform that uses Flutter, Firebase, Django, and machine learning to help farmers manage their farms more efficiently. It provides accurate predictions for crop yield, weather, and plant diseases, while also offering features for managing farm tasks. The app offers a seamless user experience and reliable predictions, making it a powerful tool for farmers.

title: Face Recognition Attendance System
description: The Face Recognition Attendance System, built with Django, allows organizations to track attendance using facial recognition technology. This system eliminates the need for manual tracking and provides real-time reports, offering a secure and user-friendly solution for attendance management.

title: Kuramo Capital
description: Kuramo Capital Management is an independent investment management firm that provides targeted global investment management services to institutional clients and ultra-high net worth individuals, focused on alternative assets in emerging and frontier markets.

title: Cashpipe
description: Cashpipe is a fintech web app that allows users to send and receive money quickly and securely from anywhere in the world. The app offers flexible payment options, a user-friendly interface, and robust security features, making it a top-performing solution for online money transfers.

title: The Maker's House Chapel International
description: The Maker's House Chapel International app, built with Flutter and Firebase, provides easy access to church news, sermons, prayer sessions, and the Bible. The app also includes a secure giving platform and an intuitive interface, making it an excellent tool for members to stay connected with the church community.

title: Uber Clone
description: The Uber clone project built with Flutter and Firebase is a ride-hailing app that allows users to request and schedule rides with drivers in their area. The app uses real-time GPS tracking to match users with nearby drivers and provides estimated arrival times and fare estimates. Payments are made securely through the app and users can rate drivers after their ride. The project utilizes Flutter for the front-end development and Firebase for the backend, including authentication, real-time database, and cloud functions.
